entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rivière-du-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:06 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rivière-du-Loup 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -22.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 57 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -28.3°C
Wind: WNW 6 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 26.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
